 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָגַח‎</span> **verb** ==push, thrust, gore== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***succeed, attain, make progress***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] as Biblical Hebrew); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִגַּח‎</span> [[Exod.21.28|Exod 21:28]]; [[Exod.21.31|Exod 21:31]]; [[Exod.21.32|Exod 21:32]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִגָּ֑ח‎</span> v[[Exod.21.31|Exod 21:31]] — ***gore***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺר‎</span>, followed by accusative of person **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַגַּח‎</span> [[Deut.33.17|Deut 33:17]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנַגַּח‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.11|1Kgs 22:11]]; [[2Chr.18.10|2Chr 18:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנַגְּחוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.34.21|Ezek 34:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְנַגֵּחַ‎</span> [[Ps.44.6|Ps 44:6]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנַגֵּחַ‎</span> [[Dan.8.4|Dan 8:4]] — ***push*** or ***thrust at***, followed by accusative: of Joseph under figure of wild ox [[Deut.33.17|Deut 33:17]], compare [[1Kgs.22.11|1Kgs 22:11]] = [[2Chr.18.10|2Chr 18:10]]; [[Ps.44.6|Ps 44:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוּס‎</span>); see also [[Ezek.34.21|Ezek 34:21]] (of Israel under figure of sheep), compare [[Dan.8.4|Dan 8:4]] (of ram in vision; object not expressed). **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְנַגַּח עִמּוֺ מֶלֶךְ הַנֶּגֶב‎</span> [[Dan.11.40|Dan 11:40]] ***engage in thrusting with***, wage war with.
